description:
This certified organic soap forms a rich foam that's gentle enough to use on your face. The concentrated formula means a small amount goes a long way. Lather it up and let the Good Juju take hold!

  • 100% natural, certified organic ingredients
  • Vegan
  • Single bar last up to 75 washes
  • Ingredients: Sodium coco sulfate, sodium cocoyl isethionate, varisoft®, turkey tail mushroom extract*, cetyl alcohol, sodium lactate, cocoa seed butter, coconut oil, hydrolyzed rice protein, decyl glucoside, broccoli seed oil, panthenol, snow mushroom extract, sacha inchi seed oil, argan oil, shea butter, lemongrass essential oil, sage essential oil, bergamot essential oil, chlorophyll pigment
name: Good Juju Shampoo Bar Balanced Hair - Unisex
